title.raw: 卷七 昭帝紀 Volume 7: Annals of Emperor Zhao

sentences.zh: 孝昭皇帝，武帝少子也。

translations.literal: Filial Emperor Zhao, Emperor Wu youngest son also.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Zhao, the Filial, was Emperor Wu's youngest son.

sentences.zh: 母曰趙婕妤，本以有奇異得幸，及生帝，亦奇異。

translations.literal: Mother called Zhao Jieyu, originally by having extraordinary gained favor, and when gave birth to emperor, also extraordinary.
translations.idiomatic: His mother was Lady Zhao, a concubine who had gained favor through her extraordinary qualities, and the circumstances of his birth were also extraordinary.

sentences.zh: 語在外戚傳。

translations.literal: Words in outer relatives biography.
translations.idiomatic: The story is told in the Biography of the Imperial Relatives.

sentences.zh: 武帝末，戾太子 敗，燕王旦、廣陵王胥行驕嫚，後元二年二月上疾病，遂立昭帝為太子，年八歲。

translations.literal: Emperor Wu end, Li Crown Prince defeated, Yan King Dan, Guangling King Xu conduct arrogant insolent, Houyuan second year second month emperor illness, then established Zhao Emperor as crown prince, age eight years.
translations.idiomatic: In Emperor Wu's later years, after the defeat of Crown Prince Li, King Dan of Yan and King Xu of Guangling behaved arrogantly and insolently. In the second month of the second year of Houyuan, when the emperor fell ill, he established Emperor Zhao as crown prince at age eight.

sentences.zh: 以侍中奉車都尉霍光為大司馬大將軍，受遺詔輔少主。

translations.literal: With Chamberlain Chariot Commandant Huo Guang as Grand Commandant of the Guards, received testamentary decree to assist young lord.
translations.idiomatic: He appointed Huo Guang, Chamberlain and Chariot Commandant, as Grand Commandant of the Guards, who received the testamentary decree to assist the young ruler.

sentences.zh: 明日，武帝崩。

translations.literal: Next day, Emperor Wu passed away.
translations.idiomatic: The next day, Emperor Wu passed away.

sentences.zh: 戊辰，太子 即皇帝位，謁高廟。

translations.literal: Wuchen day, crown prince ascended emperor position, paid respects at high temple.
translations.idiomatic: On the wuchen day, the crown prince ascended the imperial throne and paid respects at the High Temple.

sentences.zh: 帝姊鄂邑公主益湯沐邑，為長公主，共養省中。

translations.literal: Emperor elder sister Eyi Princess increased bath fief, became elder princess, together raised in palace compound.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor's elder sister, Princess Eyi, had her fief increased and was made Elder Princess, and together they were raised within the palace compound.

sentences.zh: 大將軍光秉政，領尚書事，車騎將軍金日磾、左將軍上官桀副焉。

translations.literal: Grand general Guang held government, led Secretariat affairs, Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi, Left General Shangguan Jie assisted.
translations.idiomatic: Grand General Guang held the government, led the Secretariat affairs, with Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi and Left General Shangguan Jie as his assistants.

translations.literal: Emperor Zhao, the Filial, was Emperor Wu's youngest son. His mother was Lady Zhao, a concubine who had gained favor through her extraordinary qualities, and the circumstances of his birth were also extraordinary. The story is told in the Biography of the Imperial Relatives. In Emperor Wu's later years, after the defeat of Crown Prince Li, King Dan of Yan and King Xu of Guangling behaved arrogantly and insolently. In the second month of the second year of Houyuan, when the emperor fell ill, he established Emperor Zhao as crown prince at age eight. He appointed Huo Guang, Chamberlain and Chariot Commandant, as Grand Commandant of the Guards, who received the testamentary decree to assist the young ruler. The next day, Emperor Wu passed away. On the wuchen day, the crown prince ascended the imperial throne and paid respects at the High Temple. The emperor's elder sister, Princess Eyi, had her fief increased and was made Elder Princess, and together they were raised within the palace compound. Grand General Guang held the government, led the Secretariat affairs, with Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi and Left General Shangguan Jie as his assistants.

sentences.zh: 夏六月，赦天下。

translations.literal: Summer sixth month, amnestied the world.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month of summer, there was a general amnesty.

translations.literal: In the sixth month of summer, there was a general amnesty.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，有星孛于東方。
濟北王寬有罪，自殺。
賜長公主及宗室昆弟各有差。
追尊趙婕妤為皇太后，起雲陵。
冬，匈奴入朔方，殺略吏民。
發軍屯西河，左將軍桀行北邊。
始元元年春二月，黃鵠下建章宮太液池中。
公卿上壽。
賜諸侯王、列侯、宗室金錢各有差。

translations.literal: Granted feudal kings, marquises, imperial clan gold money each according to rank.
translations.idiomatic: Gold and money were granted to the feudal kings, marquises, and imperial clans according to their ranks.

translations.literal: Gold and money were granted to the feudal kings, marquises, and imperial clans according to their ranks.

sentences.zh: 己亥，上耕于鉤盾弄田。

translations.literal: Jihai day, emperor plowed at Gou Dun Nong field.
translations.idiomatic: On jihai day, the emperor performed the plowing ceremony at the Gou Dun Nong field.

translations.literal: On jihai day, the emperor performed the plowing ceremony at the Gou Dun Nong field.

sentences.zh: 益封燕王、廣陵王及鄂邑長公主各萬三千戶。

translations.literal: Increased fief Yan King, Guangling King and Eyi Elder Princess each thirteen thousand households.
translations.idiomatic: The fiefs of King Yan, King Guangling, and Elder Princess Eyi were each increased by thirteen thousand households.

translations.literal: The fiefs of King Yan, King Guangling, and Elder Princess Eyi were each increased by thirteen thousand households.

sentences.zh: 夏，為太后起園廟雲陵。

translations.literal: Summer, for empress dowager built garden temple Yunling.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, a garden temple was built for the Empress Dowager at Yunling.

translations.literal: In summer, a garden temple was built for the Empress Dowager at Yunling.

sentences.zh: 益州廉頭、姑繒、牂柯談指、同並二十四邑皆反。

translations.literal: Yizhou Lian Tou, Gu Zheng, Canghai Tan Zhi, Tong Bing twenty four settlements all rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: Twenty-four settlements in Yizhou - Lian Tou, Gu Zheng, Canghai, Tan Zhi, and Tong Bing - all rebelled.

sentences.zh: 遣水衡都尉呂破胡募吏民及發犍為、蜀郡奔命擊益州，大破之。

translations.literal: Sent Water Bureau Commandant Lü Pohu recruit officials people and dispatch Qianwei, Shu commandery urgent troops attack Yizhou, greatly defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: Water Bureau Commandant Lü Pohu was sent to recruit officials and people, and troops were dispatched from Qianwei and Shu commanderies as urgent reinforcements to attack Yizhou, where they achieved a great victory.

translations.literal: Twenty-four settlements in Yizhou - Lian Tou, Gu Zheng, Canghai, Tan Zhi, and Tong Bing - all rebelled. Water Bureau Commandant Lü Pohu was sent to recruit officials and people, and troops were dispatched from Qianwei and Shu commanderies as urgent reinforcements to attack Yizhou, where they achieved a great victory.

sentences.zh: 有司請河內屬冀州，河東屬并州。

translations.literal: Officials requested Henan belong to Jizhou, Hedong belong to Bingzhou.
translations.idiomatic: The officials requested that Henan be assigned to Jizhou and Hedong to Bingzhou.

translations.literal: The officials requested that Henan be assigned to Jizhou and Hedong to Bingzhou.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，赦天下，賜民百戶牛酒。

translations.literal: Autumn seventh month, amnestied the world, granted people hundred households ox wine.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, there was a general amnesty, and oxen and wine were granted to every hundred households.

sentences.zh: 大雨，渭橋絕。

translations.literal: Great rain, Wei bridge broke.
translations.idiomatic: There was heavy rain, and the Wei bridge was washed away.

translations.literal: In the seventh month of autumn, there was a general amnesty, and oxen and wine were granted to every hundred households. There was heavy rain, and the Wei bridge was washed away.

sentences.zh: 八月，齊孝王孫劉澤謀反，欲殺青州刺史雋不疑，發覺，皆伏誅。

translations.literal: Eighth month, Qi Xiao King grandson Liu Ze plotted rebellion, wished to kill Qingzhou Inspector Jun Buyi, discovered, all received execution.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, Liu Ze, grandson of King Xiao of Qi, plotted rebellion and intended to assassinate Inspector Jun Buyi of Qingzhou. When discovered, they all suffered execution.

sentences.zh: 遷不疑為京兆尹，賜錢百萬。

translations.literal: Transferred Buyi to Jingzhao prefect, granted money one million.
translations.idiomatic: Jun Buyi was transferred to serve as Prefect of Jingzhao and granted one million cash.

translations.literal: In the eighth month, Liu Ze, grandson of King Xiao of Qi, plotted rebellion and intended to assassinate Inspector Jun Buyi of Qingzhou. When discovered, they all suffered execution. Jun Buyi was transferred to serve as Prefect of Jingzhao and granted one million cash.

sentences.zh: 九月丙子，車騎將軍日磾薨。

translations.literal: Ninth month bingzi day, chariot cavalry general Jin Midi passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the bingzi day of the ninth month, Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi passed away.

translations.literal: On the bingzi day of the ninth month, Chariot Cavalry General Jin Midi passed away.

sentences.zh: 閏月，遣故廷尉王平等五人持節行郡國，舉賢良，問民所疾苦、冤、失職者。

translations.literal: Intercalary month, sent former court judge Wang Ping and others five people holding tally toured commanderies kingdoms, recommended worthy good, asked people what pained bitter, wronged, lost office ones.
translations.idiomatic: In the intercalary month, five men including the former Court Judge Wang Ping were sent holding imperial tallies to tour the commanderies and kingdoms, to recommend worthy and capable men, and to inquire about the people's grievances, injustices, and cases of wrongful dismissal.

translations.literal: In the intercalary month, five men including the former Court Judge Wang Ping were sent holding imperial tallies to tour the commanderies and kingdoms, to recommend worthy and capable men, and to inquire about the people's grievances, injustices, and cases of wrongful dismissal.

sentences.zh: 冬，無冰。

translations.literal: Winter, no ice.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, there was no ice.

translations.literal: In winter, there was no ice.

sentences.zh: 二年春正月，大將軍光、左將軍桀皆以前捕斬反虜重合侯馬通功封，光為博陸侯，桀為安陽侯。

translations.literal: Second year spring first month, grand general Guang, left general Jie all with previous capture behead rebel bandits Chonghe marquis Ma Tong merit enfeoffed, Guang as Bolu marquis, Jie as Anyang marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the second year, Grand General Huo Guang and Left General Shangguan Jie were both enfeoffed for their previous merit in capturing and executing the rebel bandit Marquis Ma Tong of Chonghe. Guang became Marquis of Bolu, Jie became Marquis of Anyang.

translations.literal: In the first month of spring of the second year, Grand General Huo Guang and Left General Shangguan Jie were both enfeoffed for their previous merit in capturing and executing the rebel bandit Marquis Ma Tong of Chonghe. Guang became Marquis of Bolu, Jie became Marquis of Anyang.

sentences.zh: 以宗室毋在位者，舉茂才劉辟彊、劉長樂皆為光祿大夫，辟彊守長樂衛尉。

translations.literal: With imperial clan none in position, recommended excellent talent Liu Pijiang, Liu Changle all as palace gentleman, Pijiang acting Chang Le guard captain.
translations.idiomatic: Since no members of the imperial clan held office, Liu Pijiang and Liu Changle were recommended as men of excellent talent and appointed Palace Gentlemen. Pijiang was made acting Guard Captain of Changle Palace.

translations.literal: Since no members of the imperial clan held office, Liu Pijiang and Liu Changle were recommended as men of excellent talent and appointed Palace Gentlemen. Pijiang was made acting Guard Captain of Changle Palace.

sentences.zh: 三月，遣使者振貸貧民毋種、食者。

translations.literal: Third month, sent envoys relieved loaned poor people without seed, food ones.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, envoys were sent to provide relief aid and loans to poor people lacking seed grain or food.

sentences.zh: 秋八月，詔曰：「往年災害多，今年蠶麥傷，所振貸種、食勿收責，毋令民出今年田租。」

translations.literal: Autumn eighth month, edict said: Previous years disasters many, this year silkworm wheat harmed, what relieved loaned seed, food do not collect responsibility, do not make people pay this year field rent.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month of autumn, an edict stated: 'Previous years had many disasters, this year the silkworms and wheat have been damaged. The relief aid and loans for seed and food are not to be collected, nor are the people to pay this year's land taxes.'

translations.literal: In the third month, envoys were sent to provide relief aid and loans to poor people lacking seed grain or food. In the eighth month of autumn, an edict stated: 'Previous years had many disasters, this year the silkworms and wheat have been damaged. The relief aid and loans for seed and food are not to be collected, nor are the people to pay this year's land taxes.'

sentences.zh: 冬，發習戰射士詣朔方，調故吏將屯田張掖郡。

translations.literal: Winter, dispatched practiced battle archers went to Shuofang, transferred former officials generals garrison farm Zhangye commandery.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, practiced archers were dispatched to Shuofang, and former officials were transferred to command the garrison farms in Zhangye commandery.

translations.literal: In winter, practiced archers were dispatched to Shuofang, and former officials were transferred to command the garrison farms in Zhangye commandery.

sentences.zh: 三年春二月，有星孛于西北。

translations.literal: Third year spring second month, had comet broom star at northwest.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month of spring of the third year, a comet appeared in the northwest.

translations.literal: In the second month of spring of the third year, a comet appeared in the northwest.

sentences.zh: 秋，募民徙雲陵，賜錢田宅。
冬十月，鳳皇集東海，遣使者祠其處。
十一月壬辰朔，日有蝕之。
四年春三月甲寅，立皇后上官氏。
赦天下。
辭訟在後二年前，皆勿聽治。
夏六月，皇后見高廟。
賜長公主、丞相、將軍、列侯、中二千石以下及郎吏宗室錢帛各有差。
徙三輔富人雲陵，賜錢，戶十萬。

translations.literal: Moved Sefu rich people to Yunling, granted money, households one hundred thousand.
translations.idiomatic: The wealthy families of the Three Adjuncts region were moved to Yunling and each household was granted one hundred thousand cash.

translations.literal: The wealthy families of the Three Adjuncts region were moved to Yunling and each household was granted one hundred thousand cash.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，詔曰：「比歲不登，民匱於食，流庸未盡還，往時令民共出馬，其止勿出。

translations.literal: Autumn seventh month, edict said: Recent years not harvest, people lacking food, wandering laborers not all returned, previous time ordered people together provide horses, that stop do not provide.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, an edict stated: 'In recent years the harvests have failed, the people lack food, and the wandering laborers have not all returned. The previous order requiring the people to provide horses together is hereby rescinded.'

sentences.zh: 諸給中都官者，且減之。」

translations.literal: Various supplying central capital officials, temporarily reduce them.
translations.idiomatic: Those supplying the officials of the central capital shall have their contributions temporarily reduced.'

translations.literal: In the seventh month of autumn, an edict stated: 'In recent years the harvests have failed, the people lack food, and the wandering laborers have not all returned. The previous order requiring the people to provide horses together is hereby rescinded.' Those supplying the officials of the central capital shall have their contributions temporarily reduced.'

sentences.zh: 冬，遣大鴻臚田廣明擊益州。

translations.literal: Winter, sent grand herald Tian Guangming attack Yizhou.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, Grand Herald Tian Guangming was sent to attack Yizhou.

translations.literal: In winter, Grand Herald Tian Guangming was sent to attack Yizhou.

sentences.zh: 廷尉李种坐故縱死罪棄市。

translations.literal: Court judge Li Zhong sat on intentionally releasing death penalty executed in market.
translations.idiomatic: Court Judge Li Zhong was convicted of intentionally releasing a death-row prisoner and executed in the marketplace.

translations.literal: Court Judge Li Zhong was convicted of intentionally releasing a death-row prisoner and executed in the marketplace.

sentences.zh: 五年春正月，追尊皇太后父為順成侯。

translations.literal: Fifth year spring first month, posthumously honored empress dowager father as Shun Cheng marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, the Empress Dowager's father was posthumously honored as Marquis of Shun Cheng.

translations.literal: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, the Empress Dowager's father was posthumously honored as Marquis of Shun Cheng.

sentences.zh: 夏陽男子張延年詣北闕，自稱衛太子，誣罔，要斬。

translations.literal: Xiayang man Zhang Yannian went to north gate, self-claimed Wei crown prince, deceived misled, demanded execution.
translations.idiomatic: A man from Xiayang named Zhang Yannian went to the north gate, claiming to be the Wei crown prince. For this deception and misleading, he was sentenced to execution.

translations.literal: A man from Xiayang named Zhang Yannian went to the north gate, claiming to be the Wei crown prince. For this deception and misleading, he was sentenced to execution.

sentences.zh: 夏，罷天下亭母馬及馬弩關。

translations.literal: Summer, abolished world pavilion mother horses and horse crossbow passes.
translations.idiomatic: In summer, the pavilion mares throughout the realm and the horse crossbow checkpoints were abolished.

translations.literal: In summer, the pavilion mares throughout the realm and the horse crossbow checkpoints were abolished.

sentences.zh: 六月，封皇后父驃騎將軍上官安為桑樂侯。

translations.literal: Sixth month, enfeoffed empress father flying cavalry general Shangguan An as Sang Le marquis.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, the Empress's father, Flying Cavalry General Shangguan An, was enfeoffed as Marquis of Sang Le.

translations.literal: In the sixth month, the Empress's father, Flying Cavalry General Shangguan An, was enfeoffed as Marquis of Sang Le.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「朕以眇身獲保宗廟，戰戰栗栗，夙興夜寐，修古帝王之事，通保傅，傳孝經、論語、尚書，未云有明。

translations.literal: Edict said: I with small body obtained preserve ancestral temple, trembling trembling, early rise late sleep, cultivate ancient emperor king matters, understand tutors, transmit Filial Piety Classic, Analects, Documents, not yet said have clarity.
translations.idiomatic: An edict stated: 'Though I am but a humble person who has been fortunate enough to preserve the ancestral temples, I tremble with fear and rise early and retire late, cultivating the ways of the ancient emperors and kings. I have studied with my tutors and been taught the Classic of Filial Piety, the Analects, and the Documents, but I cannot yet claim to have attained clarity.'

sentences.zh: 其令三輔、太常舉賢良各二人，郡國文學高第各一人。
賜中二千石以下至吏民爵各有差。」

translations.literal: An edict stated: 'Though I am but a humble person who has been fortunate enough to preserve the ancestral temples, I tremble with fear and rise early and retire late, cultivating the ways of the ancient emperors and kings. I have studied with my tutors and been taught the Classic of Filial Piety, the Analects, and the Documents, but I cannot yet claim to have attained clarity.'

sentences.zh: 罷儋耳、真番郡。
秋，大鴻臚廣明、軍正王平擊益州，斬首捕虜三萬餘人，獲畜產五萬餘頭。
六月春正月，上耕于上林。
二月，詔有司問郡國所舉賢良文學民所疾苦。
議罷鹽鐵榷酤。
栘中監蘇武前使匈奴，留單于庭十九歲乃還，奉使全節，以武為典屬國，賜錢百萬。
夏，旱，大雩，大得舉火。
秋七月，罷榷酤官，令民得以律占租，賣酒升四錢。
以邊塞闊遠，取天水、隴西、張掖郡各二縣置金城郡。
詔曰：「鉤町侯毋波率其君長人民擊反者，斬首捕虜有功。
其立毋波為鉤町王。
大鴻臚廣明將率有功，賜爵關內侯，食邑。」
元鳳元年春，長公主共養勞苦，復以藍田益長公主湯沐邑。
泗水戴王前薨，以毋嗣，國除。
後宮有遺腹子煖，相、內史不奏言，上聞而憐之，立煖為泗水王。
相、內史皆下獄。
三月，賜郡國所選有行義者涿郡韓福等五人帛，人五十匹，遣歸。
詔曰：「朕閔勞以官職之事，其務修孝弟以教鄉里。
令郡縣常以正月賜羊酒。
有不幸者賜衣被一襲，祠以中牢。」
武都氐人反，遣執金吾馬適建、龍镪侯韓增、大鴻臚廣明將三輔、太常徒，皆免刑擊之。
夏六月，赦天下。
秋七月乙亥晦，日有蝕之，既。
八月，改始元為元鳳。
九月，鄂邑長公主、燕王旦與左將軍上官桀、桀子票騎將軍安、御史大夫桑弘羊皆謀反，伏誅。
初，桀、 安父子與大將軍光爭權，欲害之，詐使人為燕王旦上書言光罪。
時上年十四，覺其詐。
後有譖光者，上輒怒曰：「大將軍國家忠臣，先帝所屬，敢有譖毀者，坐 之。」
光由是得盡忠。
語在燕王、霍光傳。
冬十月，詔曰：「左將軍安陽侯桀、票騎將軍桑樂侯安、御史大夫弘羊皆數以邪枉干輔政，大將軍不聽， 而懷怨望，與燕王通謀，置驛往來相約結。
燕王遣壽西長、孫縱之等賂遺長公主、丁外人、謁者杜延年、大將軍長史公孫遺等，交通私書，共謀令長公主置酒，伏兵 殺大將軍光，徵立燕王為天子，大逆毋道。
故稻田使者燕倉先發覺，以告大司農敞，敞告諫大夫延年，延年以聞。
丞相徵事任宮手捕斬桀，丞相少史王壽誘將安入府 門，皆已伏誅，吏民得以安。
封延年、倉、宮、壽皆為列侯。」
又曰：「燕王迷惑失道，前與齊王子劉澤等為逆，抑而不揚，望王反道自新，今乃與長公主及左將軍 桀等謀危宗廟。
王及公主皆自伏辜。
其赦王太子建、公主子文信及宗室子與燕王、上官桀等謀反父母同產當坐者，皆免為庶人。
其吏為桀等所詿誤，未發覺在吏者， 除其罪。」
二年夏四月，上自建章宮徙未央宮，大置酒。
賜郎從官帛，及宗室子錢，人二十萬。
吏民獻牛酒者賜帛，人一匹。
六月，赦天下。
詔曰：「朕閔百姓未贍，前年減漕三百萬石。
頗省乘輿馬及菀馬，以補邊郡三輔傳馬。
其令郡國毋斂今年馬口錢，三輔、太常郡得以叔粟當賦。」
三年春正月，泰山有大石自起立，上林有柳樹枯僵自起生。
罷中牟苑賦貧民。
詔曰：「乃者民被水災，頗匱於食，朕虛倉廩，使使者振困乏。
其止四年毋漕。
三年以前所振貸，非丞相御史所請，邊郡受牛者勿收責。」
夏四月，少府徐仁、廷尉王平、左馮翊賈勝胡皆坐縱反者，仁自殺，平、勝胡皆要斬。
冬，遼東烏桓反，以中郎將范明友為度遼將軍，將北邊七郡郡二千騎擊之。
四年春正月丁亥，帝加元服，見于高廟。
賜諸侯王、丞相、大將軍、列侯、宗室下至吏民金帛牛酒各有差。
賜中二千石以下及天下民爵。
毋收四年、五年口賦。
三年以前逋更賦未入者，皆勿收。
令天下酺五日。
甲戌，丞相千秋薨。
夏四月，詔曰：「度遼將軍明友前以羌騎校尉將羌王侯君長以下擊益州反虜，後復率擊武都反氐，今破烏桓，斬虜獲生，有功。
其封明友為平陵侯。
平樂監傅介子持節使，誅斬樓蘭王安，歸首縣北闕，封義陽侯。」
五月丁丑，孝文廟正殿火，上及群臣皆素服。
發中二千石將五校作治，六日成。
太常及廟令丞郎吏皆劾大不敬，會赦，太常轑陽侯德免為庶人。
六月，赦天下。
五年春正月，廣陵王來朝，益國萬一千戶，賜錢二千萬，黃金二百斤，劍二，安車一，乘馬二駟。
夏，大旱。
六月，發三輔及郡國惡少年吏有告劾亡者，屯遼東。
秋，罷象郡，分屬鬱林、牂柯。
冬十一月，大雷。
十二月庚戌，丞相訢薨。
六年春正月，募郡國徒築遼東玄菟城。
夏，赦天下。
詔曰：「夫穀賤傷農，今三輔、太常穀減賤，其令以叔粟當今年賦。」
右將軍張安世宿衛忠謹，封富平侯。
烏桓復犯塞，遣度遼將軍范明友擊之。
元平元年春二月，詔曰：「天下以農桑為本。
日者省用，罷不急官，減外繇，耕桑者益眾，而百姓未能家給，朕甚愍焉。
其減口賦錢。」
有司奏請減什三，上許之。
甲申，晨有流星，大如月，眾星皆隨西行。
夏四月癸未，帝崩于未央宮。
六月壬申，葬平陵。
